get.summary: Retrieve the last stock change that was made.
Lists all inventory items. Results will be paginated.
Search for inventory item, based on the inventory item name.

post.summary: Add a new stock lot to the specific inventory item.

get.summary: Returns all shipments. Results will be paginated.
Search for shipments for a specific Wherefour order number. Results will be paginated.

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: The order number in Wherefour to search for shipments, e.g. "SO105"

get.summary: Lists all orders. Results will be paginated.
Retrieve a specific order, based on the order ID.
Search for an order, based on the Wherefour Order Number, e.g. 'SO1'.
Retrieve the most recent shipment, for the specified customer ID and order ID.
Lists all shipments, for the specific customer ID and order ID. Results will be paginated.

post.summary: Automatically select stock lots that are available to fulfill the order, for the specified customer ID and order ID.

patch.summary: Updates the contents of an order, for the specified customer ID and order ID.

post.summary: Create a new order for the specified customer ID.

get.summary: Lists all customers. Results will be paginated.
Search for a customer with the specified display name.
Lists all purchase orders. Results will be paginated.
Lists all vendor records. Results will be paginated.
Search for a vendor with the specified display name.
